subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch has agreed to a three-year contract (beginning in 2008), joining the two-time Cup champion Tony Stewart and the 2006 rookie of the year Denny Hamlin.
snippet: Kyle Busch has agreed to a three-year contract (beginning in 2008), joining the two-time Cup champion Tony Stewart and the 2006 rookie of the year Denny Hamlin.
